c74object.name: ibufmultitable~
c74object.digest: Efficient interpolated table lookup with multiple sample-accurate tables
c74object.description: ibufmultitable~ is exactly like ibuftable~, but with the added ability to specifiy an offset value (applied to the specified start sample) at signal rate. This allows the user to store multiple tables of the same size in a single buffer and access them at will in a sample accurate manner. You do need to account for the table size with your offset value (thus tables may also be overlapped).

objarg.name: buffer-name
objarg.description: The first argument sets the name of the ibuffer~ / buffer~ that ibufmultitable~ will read from.

objarg.name: start-sample
objarg.digest: Set the sample to start reading from
objarg.description:
The second argument sets the sample for ibufmultitable~ to start reading from.
Default start sample is 0.

objarg.name: end-sample
objarg.digest: Set the sample to read until
objarg.description:
The third argument sets the sample for ibufmultitable~ to read until.
Default end sample is 512.

objarg.name: channel
objarg.digest: Set the channel to read from
objarg.description:
The fourth argument sets the ibuffer~ / buffer~ channel for ibufmultitable~ to read from.
Default channel is 1.

method.name: signal
method.description:
Input signal values from 0 to 1 in the left-inlet read through the range of samples specified by the start-sample and end-sample.
A phasor can be used to linearly read through the specified samples in a loop, making ibufmultitable~ function as an oscillator.

method.name: offset
method.digest: Apply an offset to the buffer samples being read.
method.description: A signal input in the right inlet applies an offset to the samples set by start-sample and end-sample.

method.name: chan
method.digest: Set the channel to read from
method.description:
Set the ibuffer~ / buffer~ channel for ibuftable~ to read from.
The message should be formatted as:
chan / int
Default channel is 1.

method.name: endsamp
method.digest: Set the sample to read until
method.description:
Set the sample for ibuftable~ to read until.
The message should be formatted as:
endsamp / int
Default end sample is 512.

method.name: interp
method.description:
Set the interpolation mode from a choice of:
linear, bspline, lagrange or hermite.
The message should be formatted as:
interp / mode
Default mode is linear.

method.name: set
method.digest: Set the name of the ibuffer
method.description:
Set the name of the ibuffer~ / buffer~ that ibuftable~ will read from.
The message should be formatted as:
set / buffer name

method.name: startsamp
method.digest: Set the sample to start reading from
method.description:
Set the sample for ibuftable~ to start reading from.
The message should be formatted as:
startsamp / int
Default start sample is 0.

entry.name: signal
entry.description: Output an interpolated value from a buffer as a signal.
